span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto; font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 24px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

a.title: Live Video Conferencing Opt Out Form

br.br:
During this difficult time we are trying to make arrangements for students that may not have a reliable internet source at home to be able to gain access at our district buildings. Listed below are different buildings in the district and the best location outside of each of the building to get the best wireless signal.
Central Office
Johnson Elementary School
Lexington Elementary School
Scottsburg Elementary School
Scottsburg High School
Scottsburg Middle School
Vienna-Finley Elementary School

div.div: 375 East McClain Avenue, Scottsburg, IN 47170 | Phone (812) 752-8921 | Fax
